com.github.naoghuman.lib.i18n.core

Interface I18NMessageBuilder.FirstStep

  • Enclosing class:
    I18NMessageBuilder

    public static interface I18NMessageBuilder.FirstStep
    First mandory step to received a message (associated value) from the previous configure ResourceBundle in I18NResourceBundleBuilder in dependency from the I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty().
    Since:
    0.1.0-PRERELEASE
    Version:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    Naoghuman
    See Also:
    I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty(), I18NResourceBundleBuilder, ResourceBundle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      I18NMessageBuilder.SecondStep key(String key)
      Setter for the key which value will be loaded from the previous configure ResourceBundle in I18NResourceBundleBuilder in dependency from the I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty().

    • Method Detail

      • key

        I18NMessageBuilder.SecondStep key(String key)
        Setter for the key which value will be loaded from the previous configure ResourceBundle in I18NResourceBundleBuilder in dependency from the I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty().

        Hint:
        If the key can't be found in the existing ResourceBundle then the pattern '<key>' will be returned.

        Parameters:
        key - which value should be loaded.
        Returns:
        the second step in this fluent builder.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if key is NULL.
        IllegalArgumentException - if key is EMPTY.
        Since:
        0.1.0-PRERELEASE
        See Also:
        I18NResourceBundle.actualLocaleProperty(), I18NResourceBundleBuilder, ResourceBundle
